folder: Clove Road & Schoharie Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
1336 Clove Road, adjoining the N.W. corner of Schoharie Street. P. L. Sperr states that the house was at one time used as a private school for girls. It belonged to Mrs. Britton (1907 map) and, earlier (1898 map), to A. L. Barber.
June 30, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
